location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 65 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire, on board HC Cruizer Clive, Muscat to William Newnham, the Secretary to Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter reporting that he had hired the services of Moola Hussen [Mullā Ḥusayn] at Sharga [Sharjah] as agent on the Arabian Coast, as from 1 September 1826, stating that his intelligence gathering activity would make him particularly useful in that area, and reporting that he would commence looking for a replacement agent at Mogoo [Moghūyeh].
